item.title: Management and "The Elements of Surprise"
item.description: 🏗 Basic idea A research team, a department, a company is at some fundamental level just: a bunch of people talking to each other Hopefully, when people talk to each other, they convey the meaning they intended to the people they are talking to. This can be a very hard thing to do in practice. You probably have many experiences where what you say was misunderstood.
